welcome_message_body: Welcome to Az Zubayr, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this unique destination has to offer.

restaurants.name: كربلاء
restaurants.description: كربلاء is a bagel shop located in the city.

restaurants.name: BBQ Almanqal (باربكيو المنقل)
restaurants.description: BBQ Almanqal (باربكيو المنقل) is a steakhouse located in بصرة.

restaurants.name: دكّان كظومي
restaurants.description: دكّان كظومي is a food truck located in the city.

restaurants.name: مطعم عيش مادري شسمه بالعارضية
restaurants.description: مطعم عيش مادري شسمه بالعارضية is a diner located in the city.

restaurants.name: Halliburton DFAC (مطعم هاليبرتون)
restaurants.description: Halliburton DFAC (مطعم هاليبرتون) is a cafeteria located in Al Burjisiyah, Muḩāfaz̧at al Başrah.
restaurants.address: مقر شركة هالي برتونhalliburton complex (البرجسية الغربية Western Burjesia), Al Burjisiyah, Muḩāfaz̧at al Başrah, البصرة
